'''PALVERS''' is a lump allowing to define texture replacement for ''paletted versions'' of truecolor graphics. This can be used if a truecolor [[texture]] does not convert well to the game [[palette]] with the built-in closest match method, so a replacement graphics can be provided. [[Sprite]]s and [[HUD]] elements are not affected; only skies, [[flat]]s and wall textures are substituted.
The syntax is extremely simple, merely a list of truecolor and paletted texture names, for example: rgbtex1 paltex1 rgbtex2 paltex2
The {{CVAR|R|vid_nopalsubstitutions}} console variable can be used to disable PALVERS-based substitution.
